Apologies for Off-Topic message.
Just thought this may be of interest to some of the list users who would be 
following "open source" peer-to-peer technologies.

PS: All follow-up mails to be sent directly to sender's Email ID


Hello Members,

A couple of months ago we had created JXTA Special Interest Group (SIG) in 
Bangalore at Yahoo! Groups, a free, easy-to-use email group service. 
A small group of members are already exchanging information here.
We feel this would be a good idea to reduce traffic to main jxta lists do 
discuss regional issues !!
This group is not just limited to Bangalore but to anyone especially in India 
and rest of Asia-Pacific who is interested in discussing JXTA and P2P news in 
this region.

As a member of this group, you may send messages to the entire group using 
just one email address:

jxtabang@yahoogroups.com. 

Yahoo! Groups also makes it easy to store photos and files, coordinate 
events, and more.

Here's a description of the group:
------------------------------------------------------------------------

Discuss JXTA and get in touch with others around this region to learn, 
promote, adopt JXTA in your software development activities.

------------------------------------------------------------------------
If you would like to learn more about the jxtabang group,
please visit http://groups.yahoo.com/group/jxtabang


To join this group send an email to jxtabang-subscribe@yahoogroups.com

TO START SENDING messages to members of this group, simply send email
to jxtabang@yahoogroups.com

If you do not wish to belong to the jxtabang group you may unsubsrcibe by 
sending an email to jxtabang-unsubscribe@yahoogroups.com


Please convey this information to all interested.

Regards,

Moderator, jxtabang
subject: Invitation to join the JXTABANG group
